website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a more natural way to remove laundry stains, try the E-cover.
pros: Safe around kids and safe for the environment
Works really well on body fluid-related stains
cons: While you should be able to get out set-in stains with this product, it may take you several tries

customer_reviews.title: Hasn't failed me yet
customer_reviews.text: I friggin love this stuff! I just bought 3 more bottles. I had a dress with a set in grease stain. Happened a year ago in the washer. By the time I saw the stain, I had already run it through the dryer. I added this to the stain ( didn't follow the directions to were it first and add a thin layer). I added a decent amount and scrubbed with the brush. I let the dress sit for about 30+ minutes, then I washed the dress again. THE STAIN WAS OUT! I suggest this product all the time. It has been safe on colours and whites. I haven't tried it on all materials, just cotton and poly-blend. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: M.Harrow

customer_reviews.title: Get the Stain Out
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this this Ecover Stain Remover for several years, it's my go to for all stains, even ones I hadn't noticed before they dried, even blood ! So this is a required product to keep on hand .
customer_reviews.author: Ovrnite

customer_reviews.title: Go-to for baby stains
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this to scrub out cloth diapers (and everything else) for my kiddos over the last 10 years. We are now on baby #4 and this go-to product is still the best!
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cloth sanitary pads!!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this product recommended by another woman on YouTube for cloth sanitary pads and that’s exactly what I use it for and it was fantastic. Granted because of the color of the pad there was no way for me to see completely if stains are being removed but from what I could see it worked very well and I like the product a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Melody-Amor

customer_reviews.title: Gets it OUT
customer_reviews.text: I use this to pre-treat the spots before wash. It even removes blood stains, grease stains, grass stains. The best I have ever used for a pre-treatment product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Non toxic alternative to Stain Stick. :)
customer_reviews.text: Non toxic alternative to Stain Stick. This works great! Non toxic and so effective. Lid has a brush attached which is wonderful. All good!
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: best stain remover I have found
customer_reviews.text: best stain remover I have found..seems to work to remove everything on any piece of clothing. Usually pre-moisten the stain, then scrub lightly, rinse, and launder. no stain, no stain cleaner residue.
customer_reviews.author: Amor

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my daughter - she says it works like nothing else to get blood stains out - regardless ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter - she says it works like nothing else to get blood stains out - regardless if still wet or dried. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Marek

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff it really works well. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This item was exactly as promised. I will use this seller again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Debra C. Connor

customer_reviews.title: It Really Works
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best stain removal products ever!
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: Best stain remover I've ever used. Hands down!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down best stain remover I've ever used...Natural or artificial! I'm a zoologist, I have put it to the test!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I use this for all my stains. Right now my stains are mostly baby poop. This works pretty well as long as I soak the garment right away (I use cold water and Biokleen cold water detergent) then use the stain remover before machine washing. One time the stain didn't fully come out but I set the garment in the mid-day sun and that got the rest of the stain out.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Works for days!
customer_reviews.text: It works on most stains and I can treat and throw in the laundry basket for a few days before I do a load of clothes and it still works great
customer_reviews.author: Jodie

customer_reviews.title: Keep by your hamper
customer_reviews.text: This stuff takes out stains that have been dried into them. Keep one near your hamper and scrub on the stains then. It will keep you from forgetting about those pesky spots it's wash day.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not like in the picture
customer_reviews.text: I thought I finally found the old Ecover Stain Remover, with its very neutral and pleasant smell. I got three bottles of the new product instead. The smell of lavender is overpowering. If it ain't broken... why did they have to fix it?!
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without this stain remover!
customer_reviews.text: This stain remover works the best out of all that I have tried. I have yet to find a stain I can't get out. I have even gone back and taken out an old stain on a shirt. Unfortunately, the stores where I normally would buy this product no longer carry it. I was lucky enough to find this stain remover on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: REALLY WORKS WELL
customer_reviews.text: REALLY WORKS LOVING THIS STUFF, BOUGHT PROB 10 SO FAR/. GAVE SOME AS GIFTS
customer_reviews.author: LONNIE COTTON

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: This product works very well on stains especially blood. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Winquist

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works better than most other stain removers but outside of bottle gets sticky
customer_reviews.author: Doodle Mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for pretreating formula and spit up stains on baby clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best stain treatment I have ever used!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many stain removers through the years & this is by far the best! I applied ECOVER Stain Remover Stick to old stains & it completely removed them. When I apply the remover I let whatever article it is I apply it to, to sit for about half hour & then wash as usual. Always works & I highly recommend ECOVER Stain Remover Stick!
customer_reviews.author: By The Beach

customer_reviews.title: Great product, love that it’s natural!
customer_reviews.text: Gets out almost any stain we make! I have 4 kids and a German Shepard. We get covered in baby poop, ketchup, mud, blood, and all kinds of other things. If I soak in water, then scrub with Ecover, they almost always come out on the first try.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hume
